text: Dear David! Thank you so much for your support. Your feedback and mentor ship has provided me with motivation and direction towards my goals in the vfx industry. I wanted to let you know that I received my grades and I am going to graduate :) We will see what the future holds. Meanwhile I’m practicing and learning all the things I had curiousity about that I didn’t get to learn in school. If you hear about internships let me know. It’s been such a pleasure having you as a mentor. Thanks again for your time and kindness.
